item.title: Jay Leno Criticizes Political Late-Night Hosts: “Nobody Wants to Hear a Lecture”
item.description: The former ‘Tonight Show’ host took aim at partisan late-night shows in a recent interview: “Why shoot for just half an audience?”

item.title: Jay Leno Says Today’s Late-Night Hosts ‘Alienate’ Half the Audience With Political Jokes ‘Cozying Up to One Side’: ‘I Don’t Think Anybody Wants to Hear a Lecture’
item.description: Jay Leno believes late-night TV comedians have become too politicized — and that they risk losing half the viewing audience by “cozying up to one side or the other.” “To me, I like t
